item.title: Order Plan
item.description: Overview From here you can see the orders’ amount grouped by projects. The way you will visualise your orders depends on the preference you have specified in the Company Settings page. Each row in this view represents a project and carries with it the following information: Name, PM and client for the project The order’s costs for the current year For each month you can see the planned orders’ amount and the approved orders amount (coloured in grey or in red if lower than planned) The total planned amount for the current year Note
